message:
In the original post, I didn't actually have a MarshalByRefObject wrapper. The code works fine without one as long as all your code is in a single AppDomain - so if you Push and then further down your (logical) call stack make a cross-AppDomain call, the call would fail. What the wrapper provides is a proxy for the actual stack value so that the (logical) call stack can be accessed from other AppDomains.

At least, that's how I understand it. I do not have much experience with AppDomains at all.
